column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm not a coffee drinker
column2: but I love tea. I found out they have an off the menu London fog
column3: which happens to be my favorite drink. its a earl grey latte with vanilla syrup. they however forgot my vanilla syrup but brought me a little shot of it when I asked the waiter for it. their vanilla syrup was legit. I could see the specks of the real vanilla bean
